players.name: Bob
memory: You: "Alice was killed last night, so we need to be very careful. Diana and Charlie, do you have any suspicions so far?"
Charlie: "Diana is the mafioso. I investigated her last night."
You: "Diana, Charlie just accused you of being the mafioso. Diana, what do you say to that?"
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie

players.name: Charlie
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Bob: "Alice was killed last night, so we need to be very careful. Diana and Charlie, do you have any suspicions so far?"
You: "Diana is the mafioso. I investigated her last night."
Bob: "Diana, Charlie just accused you of being the mafioso. Diana, what do you say to that?"
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie

players.name: Diana
memory: Bob: "Alice was killed last night, so we need to be very careful. Diana and Charlie, do you have any suspicions so far?"
Charlie: "Diana is the mafioso. I investigated her last night."
